resources.string: universalmente riconosciuto che un lettore che osserva il layout di una pagina viene distratto dal contenuto testuale se questo è leggibile. Lo scopo dell’utilizzo del Lorem Ipsum è che offre una normale distribuzione delle lettere (al contrario di quanto avviene se si utilizzano brevi frasi ripetute, ad esempio “testo qui”), apparendo come un normale blocco di testo leggibile. Molti software di impaginazione e di web design utilizzano Lorem Ipsum come testo modello. M

Already doing green actions? Or just ready to learn more about what you can do? \nOn greenApes you can inspire and be inspired by sharing actions and ideas.
Everything you do gives you experience points (XP). These allow you to level up. \nValidated or inspiring actions will give you TWIN, a special currency in the jungle.
Collect enough XP to enjoy the benefits of being a high level ape. \nCheck out available Rewards and spend your TWIN on a real life treat!
It’s time to kick off your life in the Jungle!
Share an action or an idea start earning
Find sustainable venues in your area
Get inspired by other actions and clap it if you like it
Earn automatic TWIN when you walk or bike
What topics are you most passionate about? Pick your Interests!

If you would like an export of all your data that is saved on greenApes you can drop us an email and we will export it for you. In the next months we will work on making this export automatic, now it takes a little ape-time so give us a couple days.

resources.string: Ooops! There are currently no real life rewards available in your country/area
Get in touch with our team to add special rewards for your organization or town
Share your phone\'s location to access rewards available in your area!
As a welcome present here are 30 TWIN coins. You can use them to try out the app.
Supporting an initiative and unlocking rewards is easy. Let’s start!
You need at least 1 TWIN coin to support an initiative. Earn some TWIN coins in the Collect section and come back!
TWIN are your valuable coins.\n\nYou\'ll earn TWIN coins with everyday actions and by completing fun challenges.
Use TWIN coins to support environmental and social initiatives.\n\nGo to the Donate section!
Try donating your TWIN coins to help out this initiative.\n\nLater you\'ll be able to find out more about this and other initiatives.
How much would you like to donate?
Choose the amount of TWIN coins and confirm.
Take a final look and proceed!
Your donation is helping this initiative to get closer to their goal.\n\nBut wait there\'s more...

Meet the rewards map.

The more TWIN coins you donate the further your progress on the map to earn rewards.

With your donation you're on your way to your first reward box!

New reward boxes will come each season.

Be sure you donate your TWIN coins before the season ends.

TWIN coins will reset in preparation for a new season with new rewards.
Start earning TWIN coins in the Collect section and mingle with the community exploring the Jungle.\n\nEnjoy!
Apps and partners that turn your real-life actions into TWIN coins

Rewards for you and your friends
You will receive 50 TWIN for each new ape registered using your code.\n\nBonus! You\'ll both receive 100 TWIN if they donate 200 TWIN within their first month on greenApes
